data.name: 洞主
data.text:
The Department of Electrical and Electronic Engineering, The University of Hong Kong is recruiting PhD students for the Sept. 2021 admission. Research activities in the Department include: 
•	Biomedical Engineering
•	Electrical Energy and Control Systems
•	Intelligent Systems, Data and Networks  
•	Photonics and Electronics

For the research interests of our staff members, please visit
http://www.eee.hku.hk/research/research_interests.html

An Online Zoom sharing session will be conducted on this Saturday afternoon from 2:00PM to 3:30PM (Sept. 12, 2020, 2:00-3:30PM). After the sharing session, you will have a chance to discuss with potential supervisors individually. 

The Information of Zoom Meeting is as follows:  

Topic: HKU EEE PhD Programme Sharing Session
Time: Sep 12, 2020 02:00 PM 
Join Zoom Meeting
https://hku.zoom.us/j/94640325892?pwd=NEVweHpqWjBmREh4Y0pydisxWm1IUT09
Meeting ID: 946 4032 5892
Password: 856166

If you are interested, please send your detailed resume and research field of interest to eeerpg@eee.hku.hk by Sept. 10, 2020. Please use  “2021 PhD Application_your University and your name” as the subject of the email.  
For successful applicants, depending on academic performance, there are 4 levels of stipends (https://www.gradsch.hku.hk/gradsch/prospective-students/scholarship-funding-and-fees#3):
(1) Hong Kong PhD Fellowship (HKPF) – HK$26,600/month + a conference/travel grant of up to HK$13,300/year.
(2) HKU Presidential PhD Scholarship(HKU-PS) – HK$26,600/month + a conference/travel grant of up to HK$13,300/year+ cash award to support research and living expenses (HK$40,000 in Year 1, HK$20,000 per year in the remaining, normative study period)
(3) University Postgraduate Fellowship (UPF) – HK$ 18,030 /month (Basic level) + a scholarship of HK$1,458/month.
(4) Postgraduate Studentship (PGS) – HK$ 18,030 /month (Basic level).

data.name: 洞主
data.text: 打个小广告应该没事吧

data.name: Alice
data.text: 有没有懂的兄弟说说港大EEE是什么门槛···

data.name: 洞主
data.text: Re Alice: 来参加咨询会吧

post.text:
# 港大EEE博士招生咨询

香港大学**电机电子工程系**2021年入学博士生招生咨询将于本周六（9月12日）下午2:00-3:30在线进行。在线咨询分为两个部分：第一部分，导师将会介绍相关研究方向；第二部分，有意申请的同学和相关导师可在线以小组形式进行交流。Zoom线上咨询会议信息如下：
· Topic: HKU EEE PhD Programme Sharing Session
· Time: Sep 12, 2020 02:00 PM 
· Join Zoom Meeting
  https://hku.zoom.us/j/94640325892?pwd=NEVweHpqWjBmREh4Y0pydisxWm1IUT09
· Meeting ID: 946 4032 5892
· Password: 856166


如果你有意申请，请将你的英文简历和感兴趣的研究方向于9月10日前发给如下email：eeerpg@eee.hku.hk . email 请用“2021 PhD Application_你的学校+你的名字”作为题目。


该系老师的研究方向可以在如下网站上查到：http://www.eee.hku.hk/research/research_interests.html
研究生的奖学金有四种，具体详见英文广告。
